name: Rum Ram
description:
Rum! What a pleasant taste, what a nice bright amber color, the drink of the gods is finally ours-… Where is the Rum!? Where is the RUM!?

Suddenly all the rum has disappeared from the world and that drives everyone crazy. Mighty kings from the four corners of the earth are launching their best ship and they are prepared to ram their enemies in order to get their rum!

Get ready to Ram for Rum!


DISCLAIMER

Currently, Rum Ram can be played only as a local multiplayer game, using 2 to 4 X-Box 360 controllers only (keyboard is not supported for gameplay). This limitation is planned to be eliminated by the completion of developing.
We are going to use your feedback to prioritize improvements to the game, which means that the game will be changes in the released version.
